com.ibm.streamsx.topology.spl

Interface SPLWindow

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SPLInput, TopologyElement, TWindow<com.ibm.streams.operator.Tuple>

    public interface SPLWindow
extends TWindow<com.ibm.streams.operator.Tuple>, SPLInput
    An SPL window, that has an SPL eviction policy and an SPL trigger policy.
